April 2012 Coordinated multiple hardware data center upgrades for critical software testing Collaborated with teams in aiding engineers developers and users with data center tasks Aided users to transition from Kayako ticketing system to an internally created ticketing system Planned and executed multiple data center lab relocations on campus Repaired physical and virtual infrastructure to ensure maximum uptime Deployed tested and diagnosed Windows and Linux virtual machines for internal testing and development Designed and created NFS iSCSI and FC infrastructure for internal testing January 2009 Managed contractors to execute data center relocation from Decru to NetApp campus Deployed switches terminal servers and PDUs at the new lab Interacted with internal business units for for a seamless transition during the move Converted hundreds of physical machines into virtual machines using VMware P2V Integrated Force10 network switches into existing Cisco infrastructure Established new backbone SAN NAS data store for local builds and user directories Administrated new data center infrastructure to identify and correct any issues from the relocation Education
